bio: Hello, I'm Alexander, a passionate Software developer with expertise in creating cutting-edge applications. I've honed my skills in both frontend and backend technologies, specializing in React.js, Next.js, Node.js, Express.js, Python and PHP.

Proficient in collaborating with back-end teams to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic, implementing automated testing platforms, and optimizing components for maximum performance. Demonstrates mastery in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), proficiently applying Model-View-* (MV*) patterns. Being an experienced basketball player at the district level, I know how important it is to collaborate, build a team, and have goals in mind!
Don't hesitate to contact me with your project details. I'll happily sit down and work with you to build the best possible plan of attack to create and perfect your vision.
I enjoy taking on new challenges and solving complex programming tasks.

skills.skills_caption: I have 7 years of experience in web application development. Over this time, I've worked as a Senior Front-End Developer, Senior Back-End Developer, and currently, I'm a Full-Stack Developer at Juego Studios. Throughout my career, I've worked with a wide range of web technologies. Here are some of the technologies I specialize in.

skills_items.skills_detail: IntelliJ, Eclipse, Netbeans, Visual Studio Code, Sublime Text, Ant, Maven, Postman
MySQL, Postgres, JPA, MongoDB, Oracle, AWS DynamoDB, Ignite
AWS(Amplify, Lambda, EC2, SQS, SNS, S3), Google(GCP, GKE), Azure
Apache Kafka, RabbitMQ, CloudAMQP, Amazon MQ
Angular, NgRx, React, Redux, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, HTML, SCSS
Node.js, Express.js, Spring Boot, Kotlin, Django
Agile, EDD, TDD, Camunda BPMN, Bizflow, OOP, Design Patterns, SCRUM
Azure DevOps, Docker, GitHub Actions, Jenkins, Vercel

general.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
description: During my time at Hong Kong University (September 2017 â€“ August 2020), I honed my skills in computer science, focusing on software development, algorithms, and data structures.
I actively participated in collaborative projects, including developing a mobile app for campus event management, which deepened my understanding of user-centric design and agile development.
My coursework included advanced topics like artificial intelligence, cloud computing, and database management, providing a strong foundation for my future career in software engineering.
I received the Bachelor of Science in Computer Science award upon graduation, recognizing my academic excellence and commitment to the field.
Beyond academics, I took part in coding competitions and hackathons, where I gained hands-on experience solving real-world challenges and working under tight deadlines.

experience_items.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
description: In my current role as a Senior Full-stack Developer, I am responsible for both front-end and back-end development for game-related applications.
I leverage Angular, TypeScript, and Node.js to create and maintain scalable, performant, and secure applications.
I work closely with cross-functional teams, including game designers and other developers, to ensure that the user experience is seamless and high-quality.
A key aspect of my work involves integrating complex game mechanics into the backend while ensuring smooth communication with the front-end components.
I prioritize code reviews and documentation to maintain code quality and improve team collaboration.

experience_items.title: Senior Back-End Developer
description: I focused on creating robust, scalable server-side applications for the gaming industry.
I primarily worked with Node.js, REST APIs, and MongoDB to build and optimize back-end services supporting real-time features and multiplayer game mechanics.
I collaborated closely with front-end developers to integrate APIs seamlessly and ensure high-performance, real-time gameplay experiences.
My role involved troubleshooting and debugging complex issues related to database performance, scalability, and overall system architecture.
I contributed to optimizing code and refining API endpoints to enhance user experience and reduce server load.

experience_items.title: Front-End developer Internship
description: I worked as a Front-end Developer, where I was tasked with building responsive and user-friendly web interfaces for a variety of applications.
I gained hands-on experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React to develop dynamic front-end components and improve the overall user experience.
I collaborated closely with senior developers to refine the design and functionality of the application, ensuring it met both user and technical requirements.
I contributed to bug fixes, performance improvements, and UI enhancements across various projects.
I learned about best practices in software development, including version control, agile workflows, and testing.

section.title: Projects
section.description: Some of my most recent or past favorite creations or work.

project_items.description: Application that showcases popular locations for college students specifically for St. Mary's students. collaborated with an 7 person team.
Discord.py client that uses Hypixel & PlayerDB APIs to allow users to link and access in-game data. Simply, a versatile Hypixel Discord bot.
An e-portfolio built with React.js that utilizes GitHub API. Designed for public use and easy configuration. The second iteration of my website.
